channel.title: Shakespeare on internet weblog
channel.description: Recent content in Shakespeare on internet weblog

item.title: The final stretch
item.description: With less than a week to go here at Cambridge, I’m definitely feeling the pressure to do some of the things I still haven’t gotten around to. That has so far meant a few days of traveling and visiting some of the most beautiful areas of Cambridge. I was also informed yesterday that I won the “Academic Life” category of the PKP Photo Competition! That does mean I get a prize, though I have yet to find out what it is.
